title: Org Relationship
description: Describes the relationship between two organizations involved in an incident.

id.description: A unique string that begins with "org-relationship--" and is appended with a UUIDv4.

org1.description: The id of the first organization object.

org2.description: The id of the second organization object.

relationship.description: Defines the relationship between the two organizations. Reads as "Org1 is [relationship] to Org2." E.g., "Org1 is vendor to Org2."

anyOf.title: Competitor
anyOf.description: Org1 and Org2 compete with each for the same customers.

anyOf.title: Parent
anyOf.description: Org1 is a parent company to Org2.

anyOf.title: Subsidiary
anyOf.description: Org1 is a subsidiary (child company) to Org2.

anyOf.title: Vendor
anyOf.description: Org1 provides goods, materials, or services to Org2 on a contractual basis.

anyOf.title: Trusted Business Partner
anyOf.description: A trusted business partner is an organization or individual that has an alliance (contractually, bonded, etc.) with the victim organization.

anyOf.title: Other
anyOf.description: Other type of relationship not described by this vocabulary.
